name: Haunted Forest
description:
Note: This was my first solo game jam and my first time using Construct 3. I know the game is short simple, easy and boring, but I had never used construct before, I usually only do art for a game jam. Thanks for playing!

a,w,s,d to move

right click to shoot once

Hold right click to shoot then the bullet will follow your mouse as long as you are holding right click.

Avoid Flaming skulls, if you get in their line of sight they'll  teleport to you and kill you, they have a 60 degree line of sight and a small radius of range.

Escape the forest to win!
